title: Looking for serious duo partner to climb the ladder
body:
Been playing league for a while now and wanting to move up the ladder. Finding it difficult with so many trolls and AFK people these days, so hopefully with a solid duo partner we can escape Elo hell together. Keen to play most evening and weekends.  Suit any lane. Wanting to get serious. 

Or if anyone needs a solid member for a team contact me, currently I am in a low division but test me out. 

Cheers and cya on the rift!

replies.body: Yeah chuck me an friend request, DiamondHD2000, i was stuck between bronze 1-3 after i dropped out of silver after my promos, but now i pushed back to silver, ill see how you play maybe we could duo! :) depends on your attitude too. I'll be on late tonight so bare with me.

Nice man sounds good, will add you when I get home from work. 

Cheers
